It is the most exclusive area , with villas , embassies and foreign residences .

Belbuda

Újbuda and Tétény
( New Buda and Teteny ) .
The neighboring communities are Budakeszi and Budaörs .
Because a significant part of the district is covered by forest , the area is very popular for local hikers , and as a residence for wealthy people .
Countless luxurious villas , flashy cars and upscale quarter are located here , as are diplomatic offices .
